name: Isaac
description: Child of promise, nearly sacrificed. Dug wells, blessed Jacob. Patient patriarch who received rather than seized. The quiet one between Abraham and Jacob.

bound-on-altar.name: The Binding
bound-on-altar.description: Bound on altar at Moriah, willing sacrifice
bound-on-altar.prompt: young man bound on stone altar - wood beneath, father's knife raised, willing sacrifice, the Akedah that echoed through history

digging-wells.name: Digging the Wells
digging-wells.prompt: digging well in desert - reclaiming father's inheritance, Philistines filled them but he digs again, patient persistence over confrontation

blessing-jacob.name: The Mistaken Blessing
blessing-jacob.prompt: elderly blind patriarch touching son's hands - goatskin on smooth hands, giving blessing that cannot be taken back, divine purposes in human deception

meeting-rebekah.name: Finding Rebekah
meeting-rebekah.description: First seeing Rebekah at the well
meeting-rebekah.expression: love at first sight, divine appointment
meeting-rebekah.prompt: looking up from meditation in field - seeing camels approach, Rebekah dismounting, love that was destined, comfort after mother's death

meditating-field.name: Meditating in the Field
meditating-field.prompt: walking alone in field at evening - deep in thought and prayer, the contemplative patriarch, quiet strength over dramatic action

reconciling-esau.name: Father of Two Nations
reconciling-esau.prompt: elderly patriarch between two very different sons - Esau wild and hairy, Jacob smooth and cunning, loving both but purposes differ
